|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;F1C200s; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM926EJS |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 408<!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = GigaDevice;GD5F1GQ4UAYIG; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Allwinner;F1C200s;onchip; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2020.07;; |stockos = Linux;5.4.73;BuildRoot;
|exp_if_types = USB Type C, Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->

|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = Shenzhen LC Technology |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 02/2022 |estprice = 18 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "CherryPi-F1C200S" and "www.lctech-inc.com" are silkscreened on the board top. :later versions may have "Lctech Pi F1c200s" and the url.
{{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Allwinner]] F1C200s @420MHz (ARM926EJS) *Memory: 64MB (DDR SIP) RAM *Storage: 128MB (SPI NAND) Flash, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *USB: 1x Type-C USB (OTG) port *Power: 5V via Type-C USB port
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/02/03/more-allwinner-f1c200s-arm9-boards-mangopi-r3-and-cherrypi-f1c200s/ ''More Allwinner F1C200s ARM9 boards: MangoPi R3 and CherryPi-F1C200S'' on '''CNX-Software'''] *[https://linux-sunxi.org/Lctech_Pi_F1C200s ''Lctech Pi F1C200s'' on '''Linux-SunXi''' wiki]
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:CherryPi-F1C200S Top.jpeg|Board Top File:CherryPi-F1C200S Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
